recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with creamy egg sauce, crispy pancetta, and parmesan cheese
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, cut pancetta into small cubes and fry in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated parmesan, and plenty of black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain the spaghetti.
Add hot pasta to the pan with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly pour in egg mixture, tossing constantly. Add pasta water as needed for creaminess.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and black pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender marinated chicken pieces in a rich, creamy tomato-based curry sauce
steps: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and marinate in yogurt, garam masala, and turmeric for at least 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry the marinated chicken until charred and cooked through. Set aside.
In a large pan, sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add tomato puree and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream, garam masala, cumin, and salt. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Add the grilled chicken pieces and cook for another 10 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

recipes.title: Street-Style Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Authentic Mexican tacos with seasoned ground beef, fresh salsa, and lime
steps: Cook ground beef in a skillet with diced onion, garlic, cumin, and chili powder until browned.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Prepare fresh salsa by combining diced tomatoes, cilantro, lime juice, and salt.
Fill taco shells with seasoned beef.
Top with fresh salsa, shredded cheese, sour cream, and a squeeze of lime.
Serve immediately with lime wedges on the side.

recipes.title: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Luxuriously creamy Italian rice dish with wild mushrooms and parmesan
steps: Heat broth in a saucepan and keep warm.
Sauté mixed mushrooms in butter until golden. Set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add arborio rice and toast for 2 minutes.
Pour in white wine and stir until absorbed.
Add warm broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until absorbed before adding more.
Continue for about 18-20 minutes until rice is creamy but al dente.
Stir in mushrooms, parmesan, and extra butter. Season and serve.

recipes.title: Thai Green Curry with Vegetables
recipes.description: Aromatic and spicy Thai curry with coconut milk, bamboo shoots, and fresh vegetables
steps: Heat oil in a wok and fry green curry paste until fragrant.
Add coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Add tofu and vegetables, stirring to coat.
Season with fish sauce and palm sugar.
Add kaffir lime leaves and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in Thai basil leaves.
Serve hot over jasmine rice.

recipes.title: Classic American Cheeseburger
recipes.description: Juicy beef patty with melted cheese, crisp lettuce, and special sauce
steps: Divide ground beef into 4 portions and shape into patties slightly larger than buns.
Season generously with salt and pepper.
Heat a grill or cast iron pan over high heat.
Cook patties for 3-4 minutes per side for medium.
Add cheese in the last minute and cover to melt.
Toast burger buns on the grill.
Assemble: bottom bun, sauce, lettuce, patty, tomato, onion, pickles, top bun.
Serve immediately with fries.

recipes.title: Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta
recipes.description: Quick and elegant pasta with succulent shrimp in garlic butter sauce
steps: Cook linguine according to package directions. Reserve 1 cup pasta water.
In a large skillet, melt butter with olive oil over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes, sauté for 30 seconds.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 2 minutes per side.
Pour in white wine and lemon juice, simmer for 1 minute.
Add drained pasta to the sauce, tossing to coat.
Add pasta water if needed for consistency.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve.

recipes.title: Asian Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: Colorful mixed vegetables in a savory ginger-soy sauce
steps: Prepare all vegetables by cutting into bite-sized pieces.
Mix soy sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch for the sauce.
Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Add ginger and garlic, stir for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables in order of cooking time (carrots first, snap peas last).
Stir fry for 5-7 minutes until crisp-tender.
Pour in sauce and toss until coated.
Serve over steamed rice.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.description: Crispy breaded chicken topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella
steps: Pound chicken breasts to even thickness.
Set up breading station: flour, beaten eggs, breadcrumbs mixed with parmesan.
Coat chicken in flour, egg, then breadcrumbs.
Pan fry in olive oil until golden and cooked through.
Spread marinara sauce on top of each chicken breast.
Top with sliced mozzarella and bake at 400°F for 10 minutes until cheese melts.
Garnish with fresh basil and serve with pasta.

recipes.title: Classic Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta, olives, and tangy lemon dressing
steps: Cut cucumber into half-moons and tomatoes into wedges.
Thinly slice red onion.
Combine vegetables in a large bowl.
Add olives and crumbled feta cheese.
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper for dressing.
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently.
Serve immediately or refrigerate for 30 minutes to let flavors meld.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Rich and meaty Italian meat sauce served over spaghetti
steps: Finely dice onion, carrots, and celery (soffritto).
Cook pancetta in a large pot until crispy.
Add soffritto and cook until soft.
Add ground beef and brown well.
Pour in red wine and let it reduce.
Add tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, broth, and herbs.
Simmer covered for at least 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
Serve sauce over spaghetti with grated parmesan.

recipes.title: Pad Thai Noodles
recipes.description: Classic Thai stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, peanuts, and tamarind sauce
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water until pliable.
Mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and palm sugar for the sauce.
Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Stir fry shrimp until pink, set aside.
Add garlic and chili flakes, cook 30 seconds.
Push noodles to the side, scramble eggs in the wok.
Add noodles and sauce, toss until noodles are coated.
Add shrimp, bean sprouts, and green onions.
Serve with crushed peanuts, lime wedges, and cilantro.
